author: Staff Reporter
text: KOG-KTV Food Products (India) Private Limited here has contributed Rs. 10 lakh towards Armed Forces Flag Day. Stanley, manager of the company, presented a demand draft for the amount to Thoothukudi Tahsildar S. Chandran here on Tuesday. Mr. Stanley said that the contribution was made under the corporate social responsibility of The Companies Act. Superintendent at the office of Assistant Director of Ex-servicemen Welfare, Thoothukudi, S. Seethalakshmi said that a Flag Day collection target of Rs. 1.50 crore had been set for the district for 2015-16. P. Sankarasubramanian, Assistant, Ex-servicemen Welfare Office, and Sivakumar and Justin Chelladurai, Deputy Tahsildars, were present.
title: Rs. 10 lakh for Flag Day fund
